summary_text:
So probably we can add new column to offer type lookup in 
order to save one value in percent for sales. # Speaker 1

It looks like we still did not need to do any additional steps related to adding new column into existing object. # Speaker 1

Columns in our realty object and then we will find offer type extended and system will show us only suitable on the 
compatible field which will be you can be used within decimal number control. # Speaker 1

You click Install or Add new application and you can select something from this list or you can select Marketplace 
Powered. Okay, we need price, we need commission so we can collapse all other new config div items till we will face 
view model config. # Speaker 1

So simply speaking, this handler will be called each time when any column value changes at our user at our client 
side page in our browser. By default this folder is somewhere in temp Catalog Windows temp I decided to make it different so we 
can find logs and as you can see we have zero, which means main application logs. # Speaker 1

Let's go to our configuration section, find our form page again, open its source code again. # Speaker 1

Different contexts, different types and let's go back to our realty, try to select manager system only shows us only 
context with a certain type. # Speaker 1

In total and you can't break the way how pages code and what handlers are called there until you will write your own 
control I think so in Freedom UI we have different conditions for programming.
